Html:
If it's possible add a property for use control with the default proxy

You can get del default proxy with
System.Net.WebRequest.DefaultWebProxy

and the default credential with
System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials

Good work

set to anything you want -> GMaps.Instance.Proxy

if its null it uses default proxy as you see belove:

 

request.Proxy = Proxy != null ? Proxy : WebRequest.DefaultWebProxy;

It's work, if proxy it's not set the default proxy it's used

Thanks
